title: Trump Sues to Block Subpoena From Jan. 6 Committee
description: The former president filed suit against the House committee investigating the attack on the Capitol, seeking to block the panel’s subpoena that required him to testify and hand over documents.
dc:creator: Luke Broadwater
category: House Select Committee to Investigate the January 6th Attack
media:description: Former President Donald J. Trump’s lawyers say the Jan. 6 House committee’s subpoena lacks a legislative purpose and infringes upon executive privilege and his First Amendment rights.
